answersResultList.title: Mostly Scorpio.
answersResultList.resultContent: You're quick to act on what you think is going on, but sometimes you totally misread the situation. That's very Scorpio, but if you were a true Scorpion, your margin for error would be a lot smaller. However, you're Scorpio enough to make anyone think twice about messing with you. When you're out for personal gain in business or romance, being ignored feels like an insult. Your territory includes not only what you have, but also what you think should be yours. This makes you a great planner and an iffy manager. Let someone else manage and it's all good.

answersResultList.title: True Scorpio.
answersResultList.resultContent: You have a lot going on upstairs, but you play it close. Others are in the dark about your process - right up to the moment your results blow them away. As a true Scorpio, you own your work and your relationships, while your feelings own you. If you're not careful, your life could veer from the heights of romantic passion to the depths of bloody revenge fantasies. But you're not likely to change. As a Fixed Sign, your way is always the best way. All you need to do is make sure the good intensity outweighs the bad intensity.

answersResultList.title: Somewhat Scorpio.
answersResultList.resultContent: If you ever felt the green monster of jealousy rising within you, even if it doesn't happen often, you're somewhat Scorpio. You worry about the loyalty of friends and lovers, not as a control freak, but enough to disturb your peace of mind. Even when you're happy, it's not always easy to stay on task. There's just a lot on your mind. Sometimes people get a glimpse of it in your eyes, but mostly they're unaware of your rich inner life. Would you seize the reins of power if you had a chance? That depends on your mood at the time.

answersResultList.title: Not very Scorpio.
answersResultList.resultContent: Life can be a constant surprise for you, which is OK if you like surprises. Maybe you're not in the habit of looking for clues and cues, or maybe you notice things but don't question their meaning. If you're not very proactive, then you're not very Scorpio. Jealousy isn't an issue, and you count yourself lucky about rarely getting your heart broken or feeling too deeply. If you're happy with the status quo, the very idea of change could be threatening, and in your panic you may not realize that shaking things up is just somebody's idea of a joke.

answersResultList.title: True Scorpio.
answersResultList.resultContent: You have a lot going on upstairs, but you play it close. Others are in the dark about your process - right up to the moment your results blow them away. As a true Scorpio, you own your work and your relationships, while your feelings own you. If you're not careful, your life could veer from the heights of romantic passion to the depths of bloody revenge fantasies. But you're not likely to change. As a Fixed Sign, your way is always the best way. All you need to do is make sure the good intensity outweighs the bad intensity.

answersResultList.title: Somewhat Scorpio.
answersResultList.resultContent: If you ever felt the green monster of jealousy rising within you, even if it doesn't happen often, you're somewhat Scorpio. You worry about the loyalty of friends and lovers, not as a control freak, but enough to disturb your peace of mind. Even when you're happy, it's not always easy to stay on task. There's just a lot on your mind. Sometimes people get a glimpse of it in your eyes, but mostly they're unaware of your rich inner life. Would you seize the reins of power if you had a chance? That depends on your mood at the time.

answersResultList.title: Mostly Scorpio.
answersResultList.resultContent: You're quick to act on what you think is going on, but sometimes you totally misread the situation. That's very Scorpio, but if you were a true Scorpion, your margin for error would be a lot smaller. However, you're Scorpio enough to make anyone think twice about messing with you. This makes you a great planner and an iffy manager. Let someone else manage and it's all good.
